author: admin
title: IT Services Market in Nordic 2015-2019
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 9:14 AM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About IT servicesIT services help organizations create, manage, and optimize information and business processes. IT services also aid in managing IT systems and are process focused. These services focus on providing a framework to structure IT-related activities. A wide range of IT services are available in the Nordic. Technavio envisages that Nordic's readiness to embrace new technological advances, along with a significant number of emerging start-up tech companies in the region, is a potential opportunity for global tech players to invest in the region. Technavio analysts forecast the IT services market in Nordic to grow at a CAGR of 2.54% during 2014-2019. Covered in this report The report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the IT services market in Nordic for the period 2015-2019. The IT services market in Nordic is categorized into three categories: ITO, project-oriented services, and support and training services. The report covers the key customer segments.Technavio's report, IT Services Market in Nordic 2015-2019, is based on an in-depth market analysis, with inputs from industry experts. The report also includes the key vendors operating in the market. Key vendors
